channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024020924
item.description:
Report X-2024020924

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-05
  • City: SEEKONK
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Loose cap while handling in unload trailer 557202 at Door 14 caused closure to fall off and cause internal leakage. 1 cap came off entirely upon handling. Box became wet stained. Admin wore vinyl gloves and put contents into salvage drum lined with bag. DescribePack: Caps on damaged items not fully secure. 1 cap entirely off inside package while handling. Box stained on 1 face surface. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was segregated from all others. Spill pads placed on spill location to absorb liquid.

item.title: Report X-2024020999
item.description:
Report X-2024020999

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-08
  • City: QUINCY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler noticed moisture on outside of box and used a cart to bring to QA. Upon inspection, paint residue on inside of box. Leakage from clipped lid. DescribePack: Lid bent DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed upright

item.title: Report X-2024020991

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on truck leaking, placed into spill bin, and brought to QA cage for further processing. DescribePack: Cap on one bottle loosened allowing liquid to leak. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Placed into spill bin to prevent leakage elsewhere.

item.title: Report X-2024020792
item.description:
Report X-2024020792

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-27
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package came to QA leaking liquid from the corners of the box. with further inspection I seen that all the caps to the bottles were loose and unsealed, causing the spill. we tighten the caps to all the bottles to stop leakage. DescribePack: the package failure for this package was actually from the inside not anything outside of the box. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: proper inner packaging,
